alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Caldwell; Jackson; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 4:46PM CDT until April 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Southwestern Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Ruston to near Jonesboro to 22 miles east of Ringgold, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Chatham, Hodge, North Hodge, Dodson, East Hodge, Quitman, Eros, Sikes, Vixen, Bosco, Hudson, Friendship and Luna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
